scripts.build_global: rm -rf dist/global && mkdir dist/global && browserify src/RxNext.global.js --outfile dist/global/RxNext.js
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6 && tsc src/RxNext.ts --outDir dist/es6 --target ES6 -d
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && tsc src/RxNext.ts --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --target ES5 -d
scripts.build_amd: rm -rf dist/amd && tsc src/RxNext.ts --module amd --outDir dist/amd --target ES5 -d
scripts.build_test: rm -rf dist/test_cjs && tsc spec/observable/observable-spec.ts --module commonjs --outDir dist/test_cjs --target ES5 -d && node node_modules/.bin/jasmine dist/test_cjs/spec/**/*.js
scripts.build_all: npm run build_cjs && npm run build_amd && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_global
